distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
,
from tbl_faqquestion
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from tbl_faqquestion
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_faqquestion (FAQQUESTIONID, FAQTITLE, FAQKEYWORDS, FAQCLASSIFYID, COLLECTION, SCAN, MODIFYTIME, MODIFYNUMBER, FAQSTATE, USERID, FAQDESCRIPTION) values (#{FAQQUESTIONID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FAQTITLE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FAQKEYWORDS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FAQCLASSIFYID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{COLLECTION,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SCAN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MODIFYTIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MODIFYNUMBER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FAQSTATE,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{USERID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FAQDESCRIPTION,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

update tbl_faqquestion
FAQTITLE = #{FAQTITLE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAQKEYWORDS = #{FAQKEYWORDS,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAQCLASSIFYID = #{FAQCLASSIFYID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
